name: 科技與工程教學評量研究
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ITM0095  科技與工程課程發展及評鑑研究】 ◎課程不開放上修
description: Using intensive readings and seminar discussions, we will explore the evaluation approaches in technology education programs. A brief introduction of technology and engineering education and its evaluation will be offered to provide students’ understanding the context of technology and engineering education.
goals: To become knowledgeable about the assessment in technology and engnieering education
To provide an open, neutral forum for the discussion of assessment in technology and engineering education
To provide an opportunity for the in depth pursuit of assessment which is of personal interest to the learner
To improve the oral and written communication skills of the learner, including logical, factual based argumentation
To increase the knowledge about the literature in technology and engineering education assessment

grading.note: A journal article manuscript will be prepared and submitted to a journal. The article must focus on the assessment issue. The manuscript should be between 7,000 to 10,000 words. Each student will make a 30-minute presentation with an appropriate visual aid in class at the scheduled time.

In order for the proper atmosphere in the class to be developed and maintained, everyone must be prepared to participate in the discussion topics. Though personal opinion is important, that alone will not suffice. What’s more, it does not justify a course at the graduate level. Each person must synthesize the research and work of others to participate fully and properly.
